\begin{defn}

\begin{defn}
\textcyr{\char194\char229\char234\char242\char238\char240\char237\char251\char236}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char238\char232\char231\char226\char229\char228\char229\char237\char232\char229\char236}
\textcyr{\char226\char229\char234\char242\char238\char240\char238\char226}
$\overrightarrow{u}$ \textcyr{\char232} $\overrightarrow{v}$ \textcyr{\char226}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char238\char241\char242\char240\char224\char237\char241\char242\char226\char229}
$\mathbb{R}^{3}$ \textcyr{\char237\char224\char231\char251\char226\char224\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char226\char229\char234\char242\char238\char240} $[\overrightarrow{u},\overrightarrow{v}]=det\left(\begin{array}{ccc}
i & j & k\\
u_{x} & u_{y} & u_{z}\\
v_{x} & v_{y} & v_{z}
\end{array}\right)$, \textcyr{\char237\char224\char239\char240\char224\char226\char235\char229\char237\char232\char229}
\textcyr{\char226\char229\char234\char242\char238\char240\char224}
(\textcyr{\char226} \textcyr{\char227\char229\char238\char236\char229\char242\char240\char232\char247\char229\char241\char234\char238\char236}
\textcyr{\char238\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235\char229\char237\char232\char232})
\textcyr{\char238\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235\char255\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char239\char238} \textcyr{\char237\char224\char239\char240\char224\char226\char235\char229\char237\char232\char254}
\textcyr{\char237\char224\char232\char236\char229\char237\char252\char248\char229\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char243\char227\char235\char224} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char226\char238\char240\char238\char242\char224}
\textcyr{\char238\char242} \textcyr{\char226\char229\char234\char242\char238\char240\char224}
$\overrightarrow{u}$ \textcyr{\char234} \textcyr{\char226\char229\char234\char242\char238\char240\char243}
$\overrightarrow{v}$.\end{defn}
\begin{claim}
$[\overrightarrow{u},\overrightarrow{v}]\bot\overrightarrow{u},$
$[\overrightarrow{u},\overrightarrow{v}]\bot\overrightarrow{v}$.
\end{claim}

\begin{claim}
$[\overrightarrow{u},\overrightarrow{v}]=|\overrightarrow{u}|\cdot|\overrightarrow{v}|\cdot|sin\alpha|$
\end{claim}

\textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char230\char229\char241\char242\char226\char224}
$p_{1},\ p_{2},\ p_{3}$. \textcyr{\char207\char240\char238\char226\char229\char240\char255\char229\char236},

$\overrightarrow{n}=\overrightarrow{p_{1}p_{2}}\times\overrightarrow{p_{1}p_{3}}$

\begin{rem}

\textcyr{\char231\char224} $O(n^{k+1}k^{3})$. \textcyr{\char215\char242\char238\char225\char251}

\textcyr{\char238\char225\char240\char224\char231\char238\char236}:
$det\left(\begin{array}{ccc}

\end{array}\right)=0$. \textcyr{\char210\char238\char227\char228\char224} \textcyr{\char243\char240\char224\char226\char237\char229\char237\char232\char229}

$Ax+By+Cz+D=0$, \textcyr{\char227\char228\char229} $\overrightarrow{n}=\left(\begin{array}{c}

\textcyr{\char194} \textcyr{\char232\char242\char238\char227\char229},

\textcyr{\char248\char224\char227\char224} (4) \textcyr{\char240\char224\char226\char237\char238}
$O(n)$, \textcyr{\char232} \textcyr{\char224\char235\char227\char238\char240\char232\char242\char236}
31.2 \textcyr{\char240\char224\char225\char238\char242\char224\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char231\char224} $O(n^{2})$. \textcyr{\char206\char241\char242\char224\char235\char238\char241\char252}
\textcyr{\char228\char238\char234\char224\char231\char224\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char241\char235\char229\char228\char243\char254\char249\char229\char229}
\textcyr{\char243\char242\char226\char229\char240\char230\char228\char229\char237\char232\char229}:
\begin{claim}
\textcyr{\char195\char240\char224\char244} \textcyr{\char226\char251\char239\char243\char234\char235\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char238\char225\char238\char235\char238\char247\char234\char232}
\textcyr{\char255\char226\char235\char255\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char239\char235\char224\char237\char224\char240\char237\char251\char236}.
\textcyr{\char207\char240\char232} \textcyr{\char253\char242\char238\char236}
\textcyr{\char234\char238\char235\char232\char247\char229\char241\char242\char226\char238}
\textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char229\char240} \textcyr{\char226}
\textcyr{\char226\char251\char239\char243\char234\char235\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char238\char225\char238\char235\char238\char247\char234\char229}
\textcyr{\char240\char224\char226\char237\char255\char229\char242\char241\char255}
$O(n)$.\end{claim}
\begin{proof}
\textcyr{\char196\char238\char234\char224\char231\char251\char226\char224\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char237\char229\char239\char238\char241\char240\char229\char228\char241\char242\char226\char229\char237\char237\char251\char236}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char232\char236\char229\char237\char229\char237\char232\char229\char236}
\textcyr{\char244\char238\char240\char236\char243\char235\char251}
\textcyr{\char221\char233\char235\char229\char240\char224} \textcyr{\char228\char235\char255}
\textcyr{\char239\char235\char224\char237\char224\char240\char237\char238\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char244\char224}.\end{proof}

$y$, \textcyr{\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char242\char238\char227\char228\char224}

\textcyr{\char226\char241\char229} \textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char232}
$p_{i}\in B$ (\textcyr{\char236\char238\char230\char237\char238}

\textcyr{\char247\char229\char240\char229\char231} \textcyr{\char238\char247\char229\char240\char229\char228\char252}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char229\char234}, \textcyr{\char237\char224\char245\char238\char228\char255\char249\char232\char245\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char226} \textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char230\char229\char241\char242\char226\char229}
$B$, \textcyr{\char232} \textcyr{\char235\char229\char230\char224\char249\char232\char245}

\textcyr{\char237\char229} \textcyr{\char225\char238\char235\char229\char229}
$h$).

\textcyr{\char194} \textcyr{\char232\char242\char238\char227\char229},
\textcyr{\char224\char235\char227\char238\char240\char232\char242\char236}
\textcyr{\char225\char243\char228\char229\char242} \textcyr{\char240\char224\char225\char238\char242\char224\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char231\char224} \textcyr{\char226\char240\char229\char236\char255},

.
\end{lyxalgorithm}

\begin{defn}

\textcyr{\char239\char240\char255\char236\char224\char255} $l$, \textcyr{\char239\char224\char240\char224\char235\char235\char229\char235\char252\char237\char224\char255},

\begin{claim}
\textcyr{\char207\char243\char241\char242\char252} $L_{1}$ \textcyr{\char232}
$L_{2}$ --- \textcyr{\char239\char224\char240\char224\char235\char235\char229\char235\char252\char237\char251\char229}
\textcyr{\char238\char239\char238\char240\char237\char251\char229}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char255\char236\char251\char229} \textcyr{\char226}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char224\char245} $A_{1}$
\textcyr{\char232} $A_{2}$, \textcyr{\char239\char240\char232} \textcyr{\char253\char242\char238\char236}
\textcyr{\char240\char224\char241\char241\char242\char238\char255\char237\char232\char229}
\textcyr{\char236\char229\char230\char228\char243} $L_{1}$ \textcyr{\char232}
$L_{2}$ \textcyr{\char236\char224\char234\char241\char232\char236\char224\char235\char252\char237\char238}.
\textcyr{\char210\char238\char227\char228\char224} $A_{1}A_{2}\bot L_{1}$,
$A_{1}A_{2}\bot L_{2}$\end{claim}
\begin{proof}
\textcyr{\char207\char240\char229\char228\char239\char238\char235\char238\char230\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char238\char242\char232\char226\char237\char238\char229}.
\textcyr{\char210\char238\char227\char228\char224} \textcyr{\char240\char224\char241\char241\char236\char238\char242\char240\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char255\char236\char251\char229} $L_{1}',L_{2}'\bot A_{1}A_{2}$.
\textcyr{\char210\char238\char227\char228\char224} \textcyr{\char228\char238\char226\char229\char228\char229\char236}
\textcyr{\char232\char245} \textcyr{\char228\char238} \textcyr{\char238\char239\char238\char240\char237\char251\char245}
\textcyr{\char232} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char235\char243\char247\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char238\char242\char232\char226\char238\char240\char229\char247\char232\char229}.\end{proof}
\begin{claim}
\textcyr{\char196\char232\char224\char236\char229\char242\char240}
\textcyr{\char244\char232\char227\char243\char240\char251} --- \textcyr{\char236\char224\char234\char241\char232\char236\char224\char235\char252\char237\char238\char229}
\textcyr{\char240\char224\char241\char241\char242\char238\char255\char237\char232\char229}
\textcyr{\char236\char229\char230\char228\char243} \textcyr{\char239\char224\char240\char224\char236\char232}
\textcyr{\char238\char239\char238\char240\char237\char251\char236\char232}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char255\char236\char251\char236\char232}.\end{claim}
\begin{proof}
\textcyr{\char206\char225\char238\char231\char237\char224\char247\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char228\char232\char224\char236\char229\char242\char240}
\textcyr{\char247\char229\char240\char229\char231} $AB$, \textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char242\char240\char238\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char228\char235\char255} \textcyr{\char253\char242\char238\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char255\char236\char251\char229} $L_{1}$
\textcyr{\char232} $L_{2}$, \textcyr{\char239\char229\char240\char239\char229\char237\char228\char232\char234\char243\char235\char255\char240\char237\char251\char229}
$AB$ \textcyr{\char232} \textcyr{\char228\char238\char226\char229\char228\char229\char236}
\textcyr{\char232\char245} \textcyr{\char228\char238} \textcyr{\char238\char239\char238\char240\char237\char251\char245}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char255\char236\char251\char245}. \textcyr{\char210\char238\char227\char228\char224}
\textcyr{\char240\char224\char241\char241\char242\char238\char255\char237\char232\char229}
\textcyr{\char237\char229} \textcyr{\char243\char236\char229\char237\char252\char248\char232\char242\char241\char255}
\end{proof}
\textcyr{\char210\char229\char239\char229\char240\char252} \textcyr{\char236\char238\char230\char237\char238}
\textcyr{\char231\char224\char237\char255\char242\char252\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char242\char240\char238\char229\char237\char232\char229\char236}
\textcyr{\char224\char235\char227\char238\char240\char232\char242\char236\char224}
(\textcyr{\char236\char229\char242\char238\char228\char238\char236}
\textcyr{\char226\char240\char224\char249\char224\char254\char249\char232\char245}
\textcyr{\char234\char224\char235\char232\char239\char229\char240\char238\char226})

\textcyr{\char207\char229\char240\char229\char225\char232\char240\char224\char229\char236}
\textcyr{\char239\char224\char240\char251} \textcyr{\char239\char229\char240\char239\char229\char237\char228\char232\char234\char243\char235\char255\char240\char237\char251\char245}
\textcyr{\char238\char239\char238\char240\char237\char251\char245}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char255\char236\char251\char245}: \textcyr{\char238\char225\char238\char231\char237\char224\char247\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char255\char236\char251\char229} \textcyr{\char247\char229\char240\char229\char231}
$L_{1}$ \textcyr{\char232} $L_{2}$ \textcyr{\char237\char224} \textcyr{\char243\char227\char238\char235},
\textcyr{\char240\char224\char226\char237\char251\char233} $min(\alpha,\beta)$,
\textcyr{\char232} \textcyr{\char232\char249\char229\char236} \textcyr{\char236\char224}
$max(A_{i},B_{i})$ \textcyr{\char239\char238} \textcyr{\char242\char224\char234\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char224\char236}. \textcyr{\char194}
\textcyr{\char232\char242\char238\char227\char229}, \textcyr{\char225\char243\char228\char229\char242}
$O(n)$ \textcyr{\char226\char240\char224\char249\char229\char237\char232\char233}
\textcyr{\char226} \textcyr{\char226\char240\char229\char236\char255}
\textcyr{\char240\char224\char225\char238\char242\char251} --- $O(n)$.
\begin{lyxalgorithm}
\textcyr{\char207\char238\char232\char241\char234} \textcyr{\char237\char224\char234\char240\char251\char226\char224\char254\char249\char229\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char255\char236\char238\char243\char227\char238\char235\char252\char237\char232\char234\char224}
\textcyr{\char236\char232\char237\char232\char236\char224\char235\char252\char237\char238\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char239\char229\char240\char232\char236\char229\char242\char240\char224}.

\textcyr{\char208\char224\char241\char241\char236\char238\char242\char240\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char237\char224} \textcyr{\char228\char224\char237\char237\char238\char236}
\textcyr{\char247\char229\char240\char242\char229\char230\char229}
\textcyr{\char241\char243\char236\char236\char243} $P_{1}=AE_{1}+E_{1}B=AB\cdot(\sin(\alpha_{1})+\cos(\alpha_{1}))=AB\cdot(\sin\alpha_{1}+\sin(\alpha_{1}+\frac{\pi}{2}))=AB\cdot\sqrt{2}\cdot\sin(\alpha_{1}+\frac{\pi}{4})$
--- \textcyr{\char226\char251\char239\char243\char234\char235\char224\char255}
\textcyr{\char244\char243\char237\char234\char246\char232\char255}
\textcyr{\char237\char224} \textcyr{\char238\char242\char240\char229\char231\char234\char229}
$[0,\frac{\pi}{2}]$. \textcyr{\char199\char224\char236\char229\char242\char232\char236},
\textcyr{\char247\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char241\char243\char236\char236\char224}
$P_{1}+P_{2}+P_{3}+P_{4}$ --- \textcyr{\char226\char251\char239\char243\char234\char235\char224\char255}
\textcyr{\char244\char243\char237\char234\char246\char232\char255},
\textcyr{\char227\char228\char229} $\alpha_{i}=\alpha+c_{i}$, $\alpha$
--- \textcyr{\char243\char227\char238\char235} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char226\char238\char240\char238\char242\char224}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char255\char236\char238\char243\char227\char238\char235\char252\char237\char232\char234\char224}.
\textcyr{\char210\char238\char227\char228\char224} $\min(P_{1}+P_{2}+P_{3}+P_{4})$
\textcyr{\char228\char238\char241\char242\char232\char227\char224\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char237\char224} \textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232\char246\char229}
\textcyr{\char228\char232\char224\char239\char224\char231\char238\char237\char224}
$\alpha$.

\textcyr{\char205\char224\char243\char247\char232\char236\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char226\char251\char239\char238\char235\char237\char255\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char224\char235\char227\char238\char240\char232\char242\char236}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char232} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char236\char238\char249\char232}
\textcyr{\char228\char224\char237\char237\char238\char233} \textcyr{\char232\char228\char229\char232}.
\textcyr{\char193\char243\char228\char229\char236} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char226\char238\char240\char224\char247\char232\char226\char224\char242\char252}

\textcyr{\char207\char238\char232\char241\char234} \textcyr{\char237\char224\char234\char240\char251\char226\char224\char254\char249\char229\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char255\char236\char238\char243\char227\char238\char235\char252\char237\char232\char234\char224}
\textcyr{\char236\char232\char237\char232\char236\char224\char235\char252\char237\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char235\char238\char249\char224\char228\char232}

\textcyr{\char193\char243\char228\char229\char236} \textcyr{\char232\char241\char239\char238\char235\char252\char231\char238\char226\char224\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char241\char245\char238\char230\char243\char254} \textcyr{\char232\char228\char229\char254},
\textcyr{\char247\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char232} \textcyr{\char226}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char229\char228\char251\char228\char243\char249\char229\char236}
\textcyr{\char224\char235\char227\char238\char240\char232\char242\char236\char229}.
\textcyr{\char194\char251\char247\char232\char241\char235\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char239\char235\char238\char249\char224\char228\char252}
``\textcyr{\char238\char239\char238\char240\char237\char238\char227\char238}''
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char255\char236\char238\char243\char227\char238\char235\char252\char237\char232\char234\char224}:

$S=AC\cdot\cos\gamma_{1}\cdot BD\cdot\cos\gamma_{2}=\frac{1}{2}AC\cdot BD\cdot(\cos(\gamma_{1}-\gamma_{2})+\cos(\gamma_{1}+\gamma_{2}))=\frac{1}{2}AC\cdot BD\cdot(cos\varphi+cos\psi)$,
\textcyr{\char227\char228\char229} $\varphi=const$, $pi\le\psi=c_{1}+c_{2}+2\alpha\le\pi$.
\textcyr{\char210\char224\char234\char232\char236} \textcyr{\char238\char225\char240\char224\char231\char238\char236},
$S$ --- \textcyr{\char226\char251\char239\char243\char234\char235\char224\char255}
\textcyr{\char244\char243\char237\char234\char246\char232\char255},
\textcyr{\char232} \textcyr{\char236\char238\char230\char237\char238}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char242\char240\char238\char232\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char224\char237\char224\char235\char238\char227\char232\char247\char237\char251\char233}
\textcyr{\char224\char235\char227\char238\char240\char232\char242\char236}.
\end{lyxalgorithm}

\begin{lyxalgorithm}
\textcyr{\char206\char225\char245\char238\char228} \textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char229\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char235\char238\char241\char234\char238\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char244\char224}.

\textcyr{\char196\char224\char237\char251} \textcyr{\char234\char238\char238\char240\char228\char232\char237\char224\char242\char251}
\textcyr{\char226\char229\char240\char248\char232\char237} \textcyr{\char232}
\textcyr{\char241\char239\char232\char241\char238\char234} \textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char229\char240}.
\textcyr{\char205\char224\char233\char228\char229\char236} \textcyr{\char226\char241\char229}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232} \textcyr{\char239\char235\char238\char241\char234\char238\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char244\char224}.

\textcyr{\char196\char235\char255} \textcyr{\char237\char224\char247\char224\char235\char224}
\textcyr{\char228\char238\char234\char224\char230\char229\char236}
\textcyr{\char241\char235\char229\char228\char243\char254\char249\char243\char254}
\textcyr{\char242\char229\char238\char240\char229\char236\char243}:\end{lyxalgorithm}
\begin{thm}
(\textcyr{\char221\char233\char235\char229\char240}) \textcyr{\char196\char235\char255}
\textcyr{\char239\char235\char224\char237\char224\char240\char237\char238\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char244\char224} $G$ \textcyr{\char226\char251\char239\char238\char235\char237\char229\char237\char238}
\textcyr{\char241\char238\char238\char242\char237\char238\char248\char229\char237\char232\char229}:
$v+f-e=2$, \textcyr{\char227\char228\char229} $v$ --- \textcyr{\char234\char238\char235\char232\char247\char229\char241\char242\char226\char238}
\textcyr{\char226\char229\char240\char248\char232\char237} \textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char244\char224}
$G$, $f$ --- \textcyr{\char234\char238\char235\char232\char247\char229\char241\char242\char226\char238}
\textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char229\char240} \textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char244\char224}
$G$, $e$ --- \textcyr{\char234\char238\char235\char232\char247\char229\char241\char242\char226\char238}
\textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char229\char240} \textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char244\char224}
$G$.\end{thm}
\begin{proof}
\textcyr{\char196\char238\char234\char224\char231\char251\char226\char224\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char242\char240\char232\char226\char232\char224\char235\char252\char237\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char232\char237\char228\char243\char234\char246\char232\char229\char233}
\textcyr{\char241} \textcyr{\char239\char240\char232\char236\char229\char237\char229\char237\char232\char229\char236}
\textcyr{\char235\char229\char236\char236\char251} \textcyr{\char198\char238\char240\char228\char224\char237\char224}.
\end{proof}
\textcyr{\char213\char238\char228} \textcyr{\char224\char235\char227\char238\char240\char232\char242\char236\char224}:
\begin{enumerate}
\item \textcyr{\char209\char238\char240\char242\char232\char240\char243\char229\char236}
\textcyr{\char226\char241\char229} \textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char240\char224}
\textcyr{\char226} \textcyr{\char234\char224\char230\char228\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char226\char229\char240\char248\char232\char237\char229}
\textcyr{\char239\char238} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char235\char255\char240\char237\char238\char236\char243}
\textcyr{\char243\char227\char235\char243} (\textcyr{\char239\char238}
\textcyr{\char242\char229\char238\char240\char229\char236\char229}
\textcyr{\char221\char233\char235\char229\char240\char224} \textcyr{\char228\char224\char237\char237\char251\char233}
\textcyr{\char248\char224\char227} \textcyr{\char226\char251\char239\char238\char235\char237\char255\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char231\char224} $O(v\log v)$ \textcyr{\char238\char239\char229\char240\char224\char246\char232\char233}).
\item \textcyr{\char194\char251\char239\char238\char235\char237\char255\char229\char236}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char232\char241\char234} \textcyr{\char238\char247\char229\char240\char229\char228\char237\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232}: \textcyr{\char229\char241\char235\char232}
\textcyr{\char236\char251} \textcyr{\char239\char240\char238\char248\char235\char232}
\textcyr{\char239\char238} \textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char240\char243}
$\overrightarrow{ab}$, \textcyr{\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char232\char249\char229\char236}
\textcyr{\char241\char235\char229\char228\char243\char254\char249\char229\char229}
\textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char240\char238} \textcyr{\char232\char231}
\textcyr{\char228\char224\char237\char237\char238\char233} \textcyr{\char226\char229\char240\char248\char232\char237\char251}
$b$ \textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char235\char229} \textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char240\char224}
$ba$. \textcyr{\char207\char240\char232} \textcyr{\char253\char242\char238\char236}
\textcyr{\char225\char243\char228\char229\char236} \textcyr{\char238\char225\char240\char224\char242\char237\char238\char229}
\textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char240\char238} $ba$ \textcyr{\char234\char235\char224\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char226} \textcyr{\char238\char247\char229\char240\char229\char228\char252}.
\textcyr{\char210\char224\char234\char232\char236} \textcyr{\char238\char225\char240\char224\char231\char238\char236},
\textcyr{\char229\char241\char235\char232} \textcyr{\char237\char224\char247\char224\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char241\char242\char240\char238\char232\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char238\char247\char229\char240\char229\char228\char237\char243\char254}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char252} \textcyr{\char239\char238}
\textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char240\char243} \textcyr{\char232\char231}
\textcyr{\char238\char247\char229\char240\char229\char228\char232},
\textcyr{\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char238\char225\char245\char238\char228}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char229\char233} \textcyr{\char225\char243\char228\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char232\char228\char242\char232} \textcyr{\char226} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char240\char255\char228\char234\char229}
\textcyr{\char226\char238\char231\char240\char224\char241\char242\char224\char237\char232\char255}
\textcyr{\char243\char228\char224\char235\char229\char237\char237\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char238\char242} \textcyr{\char239\char229\char240\char226\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232}. 
\end{enumerate}
\textcyr{\char199\char224\char236\char229\char242\char232\char236},
\textcyr{\char247\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char228\char224\char237\char237\char251\char233}
\textcyr{\char224\char235\char227\char238\char240\char232\char242\char236}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char231\char226\char238\char235\char255\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char237\char224} \textcyr{\char241\char244\char229\char240\char229}
\textcyr{\char237\char224\char233\char242\char232} \textcyr{\char237\char224\char232\char234\char240\char224\char242\char247\char224\char233\char248\char232\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char243\char242\char252} \textcyr{\char239\char238}
\textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char240\char224\char236} \textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232}.
\textcyr{\char205\char238} \textcyr{\char237\char224} \textcyr{\char239\char235\char238\char241\char234\char238\char241\char242\char232}
\textcyr{\char241\char243\char249\char229\char241\char242\char226\char243\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char226\char237\char229\char248\char237\char255\char255}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char252}, \textcyr{\char234\char238\char242\char238\char240\char224\char255}
\textcyr{\char237\char229} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char231\char226\char238\char235\char255\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char243\char230\char229} \textcyr{\char243\char242\char226\char229\char240\char230\char228\char224\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char228\char224\char237\char237\char238\char229}.
\begin{lyxalgorithm}
\textcyr{\char207\char238\char232\char241\char234} \textcyr{\char226\char237\char229\char248\char237\char229\char233}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232} \textcyr{\char239\char235\char238\char241\char234\char238\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char244\char224}.

\textcyr{\char215\char242\char238\char225\char251} \textcyr{\char237\char224\char233\char242\char232}
\textcyr{\char226\char237\char229\char248\char237\char254\char254}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char252}, \textcyr{\char237\char229\char238\char225\char245\char238\char228\char232\char236\char238}
\textcyr{\char226\char251\char239\char238\char235\char237\char232\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char228\char224\char237\char237\char251\char229} \textcyr{\char228\char229\char233\char241\char242\char226\char232\char255}:\end{lyxalgorithm}
\begin{enumerate}
\item \textcyr{\char205\char224\char233\char242\char232} \textcyr{\char234\char240\char224\char233\char237\char254\char254}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char243} \textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char230\char229\char241\char242\char226\char224}
(\textcyr{\char226} \textcyr{\char237\char224\char248\char229\char236}
\textcyr{\char241\char235\char243\char247\char224\char229}, \textcyr{\char237\char232\char230\char237\char254\char254}
\textcyr{\char235\char229\char226\char243\char254} \textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char243}).
\item \textcyr{\char193\char229\char240\char229\char236} \textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char240\char238}
\textcyr{\char241} \textcyr{\char236\char232\char237\char232\char236\char224\char235\char252\char237\char251\char236}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char235\char255\char240\char237\char251\char236}
\textcyr{\char243\char227\char235\char238\char236} \textcyr{\char232}

\begin{thm}
\textcyr{\char206\char225\char238\char231\char237\char224\char247\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char247\char229\char240\char229\char231} $E$, $F$ ---
\textcyr{\char226\char251\char239\char243\char234\char235\char251\char229}
\textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char243\char227\char238\char235\char252\char237\char232\char234\char232}
\textcyr{\char241} $m$ \textcyr{\char232} $n$\textcyr{\char226\char229\char240\char248\char232\char237\char224\char236\char232}
\textcyr{\char241\char238\char238\char242\char226\char229\char242\char241\char242\char226\char229\char237\char237\char238}.
\textcyr{\char210\char238\char227\char228\char224} $G=E\oplus F$
\textcyr{\char255\char226\char235\char255\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char226\char251\char239\char243\char234\char235\char251\char236}
\textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char227\char238\char243\char227\char238\char235\char252\char237\char232\char234\char238\char236}
\textcyr{\char241} \textcyr{\char237\char229} \textcyr{\char225\char238\char235\char229\char229},
\textcyr{\char247\char229\char236} $m+n$ \textcyr{\char226\char229\char240\char248\char232\char237\char224\char236\char232}.\end{thm}
\begin{proof}
\textcyr{\char208\char224\char241\char241\char236\char238\char242\char240\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char237\char229\char234\char238\char242\char238\char240\char238\char229}
\textcyr{\char237\char224\char239\char240\char224\char226\char235\char229\char237\char232\char229}
$\overrightarrow{e}$ \textcyr{\char232} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char236\char238\char242\char240\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char234\char240\char224\char233\char237\char254\char254}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char243} \textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char230\char229\char241\char242\char226\char224}
$G$ --- \textcyr{\char238\char237\char224} \textcyr{\char225\char243\char228\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char241\char234\char235\char224\char228\char251\char226\char224\char242\char252\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char232\char231} \textcyr{\char234\char240\char224\char233\char237\char229\char233}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char232} $E$ \textcyr{\char232}
\textcyr{\char234\char240\char224\char233\char237\char229\char233}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char232} $F$. \textcyr{\char207\char238\char253\char242\char238\char236\char243}
\textcyr{\char236\char238\char230\char237\char238} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char236\char238\char242\char240\char229\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char237\char224} \textcyr{\char237\char238\char240\char236\char224\char235\char252}
\textcyr{\char234} \textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char240\char243}
\textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char230\char229\char241\char242\char226\char224}
$E$ \textcyr{\char232} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char234\char224\char231\char224\char242\char252},
\textcyr{\char247\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char228\char235\char255}
\textcyr{\char235\char254\char225\char238\char233} \textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char232}
$K\in F$ \textcyr{\char225\char243\char228\char229\char242} \textcyr{\char255\char226\char235\char255\char242\char252\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char234\char240\char224\char233\char237\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char240\char238\char236} (\textcyr{\char226}
\textcyr{\char238\char225\char240\char224\char242\char237\char243\char254}
\textcyr{\char241\char242\char238\char240\char238\char237\char243}
\textcyr{\char226\char241\char229} \textcyr{\char240\char224\char225\char238\char242\char224\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char224\char237\char224\char235\char238\char227\char232\char247\char237\char238}).
\textcyr{\char206\char241\char242\char224\char235\char238\char241\char252}
\textcyr{\char238\char225\char240\char224\char225\char238\char242\char224\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char241\char235\char243\char247\char224\char233} \textcyr{\char239\char224\char240\char224\char235\char235\char229\char235\char252\char237\char251\char245}
\textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char229\char240}: \textcyr{\char242\char238\char227\char228\char224}
\textcyr{\char232\char245} \textcyr{\char241\char243\char236\char236\char224}
\textcyr{\char225\char243\char228\char229\char242} \textcyr{\char234\char240\char224\char233\char237\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char240\char238\char236}.
\end{proof}
\textcyr{\char200\char231} \textcyr{\char228\char238\char234\char224\char231\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char241\char242\char226\char224}
\textcyr{\char228\char224\char237\char237\char238\char233} \textcyr{\char242\char229\char238\char240\char229\char236\char251}

\textcyr{\char241\char235\char229\char228\char243\char254\char249\char232\char233}:
\begin{lyxalgorithm}

\begin{problem}
\textcyr{\char197\char241\char242\char252} \textcyr{\char228\char232\char226\char224\char237}
\textcyr{\char232} \textcyr{\char240\char238\char225\char238\char242},
\textcyr{\char234\char238\char242\char238\char240\char251\char229}
\textcyr{\char232\char236\char229\char254\char242} \textcyr{\char244\char238\char240\char236\char243}
\textcyr{\char226\char251\char239\char243\char234\char235\char238\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char227\char238\char243\char227\char238\char235\char252\char237\char232\char234\char224}.
\textcyr{\char206\char239\char240\char229\char228\char229\char235\char232\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char195\char204\char210} \textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char229\char234}
\textcyr{\char246\char229\char237\char242\char240\char224} \textcyr{\char240\char238\char225\char238\char242\char224}
$R$, \textcyr{\char227\char228\char229} \textcyr{\char238\char237}
\textcyr{\char236\char238\char230\char229\char242} \textcyr{\char238\char234\char224\char231\char224\char242\char252\char241\char255}.

\textcyr{\char199\char224\char236\char229\char242\char232\char236},
\textcyr{\char247\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char195\char204\char210}
\textcyr{\char238\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232\char247\char232\char226\char224\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char237\char229\char234\char238\char242\char238\char240\char251\char233}
\textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char227\char238\char243\char227\char238\char235\char252\char237\char232\char234},
\textcyr{\char234\char238\char242\char238\char240\char251\char233}
\textcyr{\char241\char232\char235\char252\char237\char238} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char245\char238\char230}
\textcyr{\char237\char224} \textcyr{\char241\char243\char236\char236\char243}
\textcyr{\char204\char232\char237\char234\char238\char226\char241\char234\char238\char227\char238}
$D$ \textcyr{\char232} $R$ (\textcyr{\char227\char228\char229} \textcyr{\char247\char229\char240\char229\char231}
$D$ \textcyr{\char238\char225\char238\char231\char237\char224\char247\char224\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char228\char232\char226\char224\char237}). \textcyr{\char215\char242\char238}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char238\char232\char241\char245\char238\char228\char232\char242},
\textcyr{\char234\char238\char227\char228\char224} \textcyr{\char240\char238\char225\char238\char242}
\textcyr{\char239\char229\char240\char229\char241\char229\char234\char224\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char228\char232\char226\char224\char237}? \textcyr{\char210\char238\char227\char228\char224}
\textcyr{\char228\char235\char255} \textcyr{\char226\char229\char234\char242\char238\char240\char224}
$\overrightarrow{x}$ \textcyr{\char226\char251\char239\char238\char235\char237\char229\char237\char238}
\textcyr{\char241\char238\char238\char242\char237\char238\char248\char229\char237\char232\char229}:
$R+\overrightarrow{x}\cap D\ne\varnothing$. \textcyr{\char199\char237\char224\char247\char232\char242},
\textcyr{\char241\char243\char249\char229\char241\char242\char226\char243\char254\char242}
\textcyr{\char242\char224\char234\char232\char229} $\overrightarrow{r}\in R$,
$\overrightarrow{d}\in D$, \textcyr{\char242\char224\char234\char232\char229}
\textcyr{\char247\char242\char238} $\overrightarrow{r}+\overrightarrow{x}=\overrightarrow{d},$
\textcyr{\char247\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char240\char224\char226\char237\char238\char241\char232\char235\char252\char237\char238}
$\overrightarrow{x}=\overrightarrow{d}-\overrightarrow{r}$. \textcyr{\char194}
\textcyr{\char232\char242\char238\char227\char229}, $X=D\oplus(-R)$.

\bigskip
\end{problem}

\section{$\mathsection36$. \textcyr{\char210\char240\char232\char224\char237\char227\char243\char235\char255\char246\char232\char255}
\textcyr{\char196\char229\char235\char238\char237\char229}}
\begin{defn}
\textcyr{\char206\char225\char238\char231\char237\char224\char247\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char247\char229\char240\char229\char231} $V$ --- \textcyr{\char237\char229\char234\char238\char242\char238\char240\char238\char229}
\textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char230\char229\char241\char242\char226\char238}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char229\char234} \textcyr{\char237\char224}
\textcyr{\char239\char235\char238\char241\char234\char238\char241\char242\char232}.
\textcyr{\char210\char240\char232\char224\char237\char227\char243\char235\char255\char246\char232\char229\char233}
\textcyr{\char196\char229\char235\char238\char237\char229} \textcyr{\char237\char224\char231\char251\char226\char224\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char242\char224\char234\char224\char255} \textcyr{\char242\char240\char232\char224\char237\char227\char243\char235\char255\char246\char232\char255}
\textcyr{\char239\char235\char238\char241\char234\char238\char241\char242\char232},
\textcyr{\char247\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char228\char235\char255}
\textcyr{\char235\char254\char225\char238\char227\char238} \textcyr{\char242\char240\char229\char243\char227\char238\char235\char252\char237\char232\char234\char224}
\textcyr{\char232\char231} \textcyr{\char242\char240\char232\char224\char237\char227\char243\char235\char255\char246\char232\char232}
\textcyr{\char229\char227\char238} \textcyr{\char238\char239\char232\char241\char224\char237\char237\char251\char233}
\textcyr{\char234\char240\char243\char227} \textcyr{\char241\char238\char228\char229\char240\char230\char232\char242}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char235\char252\char234\char238} \textcyr{\char226\char229\char240\char248\char232\char237\char251}
\textcyr{\char242\char240\char229\char243\char227\char238\char235\char252\char237\char232\char234\char224}.

\textcyr{\char196\char235\char255} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char241\char242\char240\char238\char229\char237\char232\char255}
\textcyr{\char242\char240\char232\char224\char237\char227\char243\char235\char255\char246\char232\char232}
\textcyr{\char225\char243\char228\char229\char236} \textcyr{\char228\char238\char225\char224\char226\char235\char255\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char239\char238} \textcyr{\char238\char228\char237\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char229}. \textcyr{\char193\char243\char228\char229\char236}
\textcyr{\char241\char247\char232\char242\char224\char242\char252},
\textcyr{\char247\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char237\char232\char234\char224\char234\char232\char229}
4 \textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char232} \textcyr{\char237\char229}
\textcyr{\char235\char229\char230\char224\char242} \textcyr{\char237\char224}
\textcyr{\char238\char228\char237\char238\char233} \textcyr{\char238\char234\char240\char243\char230\char237\char238\char241\char242\char232},
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char227\char228\char224} \textcyr{\char242\char240\char232\char224\char237\char227\char243\char235\char255\char246\char232\char255}
\textcyr{\char225\char243\char228\char229\char242} \textcyr{\char229\char228\char232\char237\char241\char242\char226\char229\char237\char237\char238\char233}.\end{defn}
\begin{claim}
(\textcyr{\char202\char240\char232\char242\char229\char240\char232\char233}
\textcyr{\char196\char229\char235\char238\char237\char229}) \textcyr{\char208\char229\char225\char240\char238}
$AB$ \textcyr{\char239\char240\char232\char237\char224\char228\char235\char229\char230\char232\char242}
\textcyr{\char242\char240\char232\char224\char237\char227\char243\char235\char255\char246\char232\char232}
\textcyr{\char196\char229\char235\char238\char237\char229}, \textcyr{\char241\char238\char227\char228\char224}
\textcyr{\char241\char243\char249\char229\char241\char242\char226\char243\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char238\char234\char240\char243\char230\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char241} \textcyr{\char245\char238\char240\char228\char238\char233}
$AB$, \textcyr{\char226\char237\char243\char242\char240\char229\char237\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char234\char238\char242\char238\char240\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char237\char229} \textcyr{\char241\char238\char228\char229\char240\char230\char232\char242}
\textcyr{\char228\char240\char243\char227\char232\char245} \textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char229\char234}
\textcyr{\char242\char240\char232\char224\char237\char227\char243\char235\char255\char246\char232\char232}.\end{claim}
\begin{proof}
\textcyr{\char205\char229\char238\char225\char245\char238\char228\char232\char236\char238\char241\char242\char252}.
\textcyr{\char197\char241\char235\char232} \textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char240\char238}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char232\char237\char224\char228\char235\char229\char230\char232\char242}
\textcyr{\char242\char240\char232\char224\char237\char227\char243\char235\char255\char246\char232\char232},
\textcyr{\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char242\char238\char227\char228\char224}
\textcyr{\char241\char243\char249\char229\char241\char242\char226\char243\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char242\char240\char229\char243\char227\char238\char235\char252\char237\char232\char234},
\textcyr{\char234\char238\char242\char238\char240\char251\char233}

\section{$\mathsection37.$ \textcyr{\char196\char232\char224\char227\char240\char224\char236\char236\char224}
\textcyr{\char194\char238\char240\char238\char237\char238\char227\char238}}

\textcyr{\char199\char224\char228\char224\char247\char224}: \textcyr{\char228\char235\char255}
\textcyr{\char234\char224\char230\char228\char238\char233} \textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char232}
\textcyr{\char237\char224} \textcyr{\char239\char235\char238\char241\char234\char238\char241\char242\char232}
(\textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char230\char229\char241\char242\char226\char238}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char229\char234} \textcyr{\char234\char238\char237\char229\char247\char237\char238})
\textcyr{\char237\char224\char228\char238} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char237\char255\char242\char252},
\textcyr{\char234\char224\char234\char224\char255} \textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char224}
\textcyr{\char232\char231} \textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char230\char229\char241\char242\char226\char224}
\textcyr{\char255\char226\char235\char255\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char225\char235\char232\char230\char224\char233\char248\char229\char233}.
\begin{defn}
\textcyr{\char196\char232\char224\char227\char240\char224\char236\char236\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char194\char238\char240\char238\char237\char238\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char237\char224\char231\char251\char226\char224\char229\char242\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char240\char224\char231\char225\char232\char229\char237\char232\char229}
\textcyr{\char234\char238\char237\char229\char247\char237\char238\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char230\char229\char241\char242\char226\char224}
$X$ \textcyr{\char237\char224} \textcyr{\char255\char247\char229\char233\char234\char232}
$X_{i}$ \textcyr{\char242\char224\char234\char232\char236} \textcyr{\char238\char225\char240\char224\char231\char238\char236},
\textcyr{\char247\char242\char238} $X_{i}=\{y\,|\,\rho(x_{i},y)\rightarrow min\}$.
\end{defn}
\textcyr{\char209\char243\char249\char229\char241\char242\char226\char243\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char242\char240\char232\char226\char232\char224\char235\char252\char237\char251\char233}
\textcyr{\char224\char235\char227\char238\char240\char232\char242\char236}
\textcyr{\char231\char224} $O(N^{4})$, \textcyr{\char234\char238\char242\char238\char240\char251\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char238\char241\char236\char224\char242\char240\char232\char226\char224\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char241\char229\char240\char229\char228\char232\char237\char237\char251\char229}
\textcyr{\char239\char229\char240\char239\char229\char237\char228\char232\char234\char243\char235\char255\char240\char251}
\textcyr{\char235\char254\char225\char238\char233} \textcyr{\char239\char224\char240\char251}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char229\char234}, \textcyr{\char224}
\textcyr{\char231\char224\char242\char229\char236} \textcyr{\char232\char245}
\textcyr{\char239\char229\char240\char229\char241\char229\char234\char224\char229\char242}.
\begin{claim}
\textcyr{\char208\char229\char225\char240\char238} $AB$ \textcyr{\char239\char240\char232\char237\char224\char228\char235\char229\char230\char232\char242}
\textcyr{\char242\char240\char232\char224\char237\char227\char243\char235\char255\char246\char232\char232}
\textcyr{\char196\char229\char235\char238\char237\char229} \textcyr{\char242\char238\char227\char228\char224}
\textcyr{\char232} \textcyr{\char242\char238\char235\char252\char234\char238}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char227\char228\char224}, \textcyr{\char234\char238\char227\char228\char224}
\textcyr{\char255\char247\char229\char233\char234\char232} $C(A)$
\textcyr{\char232} $C(B)$ \textcyr{\char228\char232\char224\char227\char240\char224\char236\char236\char251}
\textcyr{\char194\char238\char240\char238\char237\char238\char226\char224}
\textcyr{\char232\char236\char229\char254\char242} \textcyr{\char238\char225\char249\char243\char254}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232\char246\char243}
(\textcyr{\char245\char238\char242\char255} \textcyr{\char225\char251}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char243}).\end{claim}
\begin{proof}
\textcyr{\char199\char224\char236\char229\char242\char232\char236},
\textcyr{\char247\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char229\char241\char235\char232}
\textcyr{\char240\char224\char241\char241\char236\char238\char242\char240\char229\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char239\char229\char240\char229\char241\char229\char247\char229\char237\char232\char229}
\textcyr{\char255\char247\char229\char229\char234} \textcyr{\char228\char232\char224\char227\char240\char224\char236\char236\char251}
\textcyr{\char194\char238\char240\char238\char237\char238\char226\char224},
\textcyr{\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char253\char242\char224} \textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char224}
\textcyr{\char225\char243\char228\char229\char242} \textcyr{\char246\char229\char237\char242\char240\char238\char236}
\textcyr{\char238\char234\char240\char243\char230\char237\char238\char241\char242\char232}
\textcyr{\char236\char237\char238\char227\char238\char243\char227\char238\char235\char252\char237\char232\char234\char224},
\textcyr{\char234\char238\char242\char238\char240\char251\char229}
\textcyr{\char241\char238\char231\char228\char224\char254\char242}
\textcyr{\char228\char224\char237\char237\char251\char229} \textcyr{\char255\char247\char229\char233\char234\char232}.

\textit{\textcyr{\char196\char238\char241\char242\char224\char242\char238\char247\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}.}
\textcyr{\char209\char243\char249\char229\char241\char242\char226\char243\char229\char242}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char224} \textcyr{\char237\char224}
\textcyr{\char241\char229\char240\char229\char228\char232\char237\char237\char238\char236}
\textcyr{\char239\char229\char240\char239\char229\char237\char228\char232\char234\char243\char235\char255\char240\char229},
\textcyr{\char238\char234\char240\char243\char230\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char234\char238\char242\char238\char240\char238\char227\char238}
\textcyr{\char241\char238\char228\char229\char240\char230\char232\char242}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char235\char252\char234\char238} \textcyr{\char237\char229\char238\char225\char245\char238\char228\char232\char236\char251\char229}
\textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char234\char232}. \textcyr{\char209\char235\char229\char228\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char237\char238},
\textcyr{\char239\char238} \textcyr{\char234\char240\char232\char242\char229\char240\char232\char254}
\textcyr{\char196\char229\char235\char238\char237\char229}, \textcyr{\char240\char229\char225\char240\char238}
$AB$ \textcyr{\char225\char243\char228\char229\char242} \textcyr{\char239\char240\char232\char237\char224\char228\char235\char229\char230\char224\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char242\char240\char232\char224\char237\char227\char243\char235\char255\char246\char232\char232}
\textcyr{\char196\char229\char235\char238\char237\char229}.

\textit{\textcyr{\char205\char229\char238\char225\char245\char238\char228\char232\char236\char238\char241\char242\char252}.
}\textcyr{\char207\char238} \textcyr{\char234\char240\char232\char242\char229\char240\char232\char254}
\textcyr{\char196\char229\char235\char238\char237\char229} \textcyr{\char241\char242\char240\char238\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char238\char234\char240\char243\char230\char237\char238\char241\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char241} \textcyr{\char245\char238\char240\char228\char238\char233}
$AB,$ \textcyr{\char237\char229} \textcyr{\char241\char238\char228\char229\char240\char230\char224\char249\char229\char233}
\textcyr{\char228\char240\char243\char227\char232\char245} \textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char229\char234}.
\textcyr{\char210\char238\char227\char228\char224} \textcyr{\char229\char188}
\textcyr{\char246\char229\char237\char242\char240} \textcyr{\char239\char240\char232\char237\char224\char228\char235\char229\char230\char232\char242}
\textcyr{\char227\char240\char224\char237\char232\char246\char229}
\textcyr{\char255\char247\char229\char229\char234} $C(A)$ \textcyr{\char232}
$C(B)$.\end{proof}
\begin{lyxalgorithm}
\textcyr{\char207\char238\char241\char242\char240\char238\char229\char237\char232\char229}
\textcyr{\char228\char232\char224\char227\char240\char224\char236\char236\char251}
\textcyr{\char194\char238\char240\char238\char237\char238\char227\char238}
(\textcyr{\char224\char235\char227\char238\char240\char232\char242\char236}
\textcyr{\char212\char238\char240\char247\char243\char237\char229})

\textcyr{\char193\char243\char228\char229\char236} \textcyr{\char232\char241\char239\char238\char235\char252\char231\char238\char226\char224\char242\char252}
\textcyr{\char236\char229\char242\char238\char228} \textcyr{\char241\char234\char224\char237\char232\char240\char243\char254\char249\char229\char233}
\textcyr{\char239\char240\char255\char236\char238\char233}. \textcyr{\char208\char224\char241\char241\char236\char238\char242\char240\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char228\char235\char255} \textcyr{\char234\char224\char230\char228\char238\char233}
\textcyr{\char232\char231} \textcyr{\char242\char238\char247\char229\char234}
\textcyr{\char195\char204\char210}, \textcyr{\char242\char224\char234\char232\char245}
\textcyr{\char247\char242\char238} \textcyr{\char240\char224\char241\char241\char242\char238\char255\char237\char232\char255}

\section{$\mathsection40$. \textcyr{\char192\char242\char238\char236\char224\char240\char237\char251\char229}

\textcyr{\char194} \textcyr{\char239\char240\char238\char248\char235\char238\char236}

\textcyr{\char196\char235\char255} \textcyr{\char239\char238\char235\char252\char231\char238\char226\char224\char242\char229\char235\char252\char241\char234\char232\char245}

\section{Events}

\textcyr{\char208\char224\char241\char241\char236\char238\char242\char240\char232\char236}
\textcyr{\char236\char229\char245\char224\char237\char232\char231\char236}

\textcyr{\char202\char224\char234} \textcyr{\char253\char242\char238}
\textcyr{\char228\char229\char235\char224\char242\char252} \textcyr{\char239\char240\char232}
\textcyr{\char239\char238\char236\char238\char249\char232} mutex-\textcyr{\char238\char226}:
\begin{lyxcode}
bool~flag;

std::mutex~m;

void~wait\_for\_flag()~\{
\begin{lyxcode}
std::unique\_lock<std::mutex>~l(m);

while~(!flag)~\{
\begin{lyxcode}
l.unlock();

std::this\_thread::sleep\_for(std::chrono::multiseconds(100));

l.lock();
\end{lyxcode}
\}
\end{lyxcode}
\}
\end{lyxcode}
\textcyr{\char194} \textcyr{\char228\char224\char237\char237\char238\char236}

\textcyr{\char197\char241\char242\char252} \textcyr{\char226} Windows
\textcyr{\char241\char224\char236\char238\char241\char225\char240\char224\char241\char251\char226\char224\char254\char249\char232\char229\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char232} \textcyr{\char237\char229\char241\char224\char236\char238\char241\char225\char240\char224\char241\char251\char226\char224\char254\char249\char232\char229\char241\char255}
\textcyr{\char241\char238\char225\char251\char242\char232\char255}.
\begin{lyxcode}
\#include~<condition\_variable>

std::mutex~m;

std::queue<data\_chunk>~data\_queue;

std::condition\_variable~data\_cond;

void~data\_preparation\_thread()~\{
\begin{lyxcode}
while(hasData())~\{
\begin{lyxcode}
const~data\_chuk~data~=~prepare();

std::lock\_guard<std::mutex>~l(m);

data\_queue.push(data);

data\_cond.notify\_one();
\end{lyxcode}
\}
\end{lyxcode}
\}

void~data\_processing\_thread()~\{
\begin{lyxcode}
while~(true)~\{
\begin{lyxcode}
std::unique\_lock<mutex>~l(m);

data\_cond.wait(l,~{[}{]}\{return~!data\_queue.empty()\});

data\_chunk~data~=~data\_queue.foront();

data\_queue.pop();

l.unlock();

process(data);

if~(is\_last\_chunk(data))~\{
\begin{lyxcode}
return;
\end{lyxcode}
\}
\end{lyxcode}
\}
\end{lyxcode}
\}
\end{lyxcode}

\textcyr{\char241\char235\char224\char242\char252} \textcyr{\char242\char238\char227\char228\char224},

\textcyr{\char205\char224\char239\char232\char248\char229\char236}
\textcyr{\char238\char225\char240\char224\char225\char238\char242\char247\char232\char234}

\textcyr{\char241\char232\char237\char245\char240\char238\char237\char232\char231\char224\char246\char232\char232}:
\begin{lyxcode}
\#include~<mutex>

\#include~<condition\_variable>

\#include~<memory>

template~<class~T>

class~ThreadSafeQueue~\{

public:
\begin{lyxcode}
ThreadSafeQueue();

void~push(T~value);

bool~try\_pop(T\&~value);

shared\_ptr<T>~try\_pop();

void~wait\_and\_pop(T\&~value);

shared\_ptr<T>~wait\_and\_pop();
\end{lyxcode}
private:
\begin{lyxcode}
std::mutex~m;

std::queue<T>~data\_queue;

std::condition\_variable~data\_cond;
\end{lyxcode}
\}

template<class~T>

void~ThreadSafeQueue::push(T~newValue)~\{
\begin{lyxcode}
std::lock\_guard<...>~l(m);

data\_queue.push(newValue);

data\_cond.notify\_one();
\end{lyxcode}
\}

template<class~T>

shared\_ptr<T>~ThreadSafeQueue::wait\_and\_pop()~\{
\begin{lyxcode}
std::unique\_lock<...>~l(m);

data\_cond.wait(l,~{[}this{]}~\{return~!data.push.empty();{]}\});

std::shared\_ptr<T>~result~=~std::make\_shared(data\_queue.front());

data\_queue.pop();

return~res;
\end{lyxcode}
\}
\end{lyxcode}
